object.name: candidate_filing
object.property: <?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf8'?> <model xmlns:security="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/security" xmlns:form="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/form" xmlns:marshal="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/marshal" xmlns="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/schema"> <schema> <field name="title" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description/> <title>Candidate Name</title> </field> <field name="office" type="zope.schema.Choice"> <description>To create a new office, choose "New Office and enter a category and office name.</description> <title>Office</title> <source>yoloelections.content.filings.officeVocabulary</source> </field> <field name="office_category" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description>For example, "City of Davis"</description> <title>Office Category</title> </field> <field name="office_name" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description/> <title>Office Name</title> </field> <field name="ballot_designation" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Ballot Designation</title> </field> <field name="party" type="zope.schema.Choice"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Party</title> <source>yoloelections.content.filings.partiesVocabulary</source> </field> <field name="county_of_residence" type="zope.schema.Choice"> <default>Yolo</default> <title>County of Residence</title> <values> <element>Alameda</element> <element>Alpine</element> <element>Amador</element> <element>Butte</element> <element>Calaveras</element> <element>Colusa</element> <element>Contra Costa</element> <element>Del Norte</element> <element>El Dorado</element> <element>Fresno</element> <element>Glenn</element> <element>Humboldt</element> <element>Imperial</element> <element>Inyo</element> <element>Kern</element> <element>Kings</element> <element>Lake</element> <element>Lassen</element> <element>Los Angeles</element> <element>Madera</element> <element>Marin</element> <element>Mariposa</element> <element>Mendocino</element> <element>Merced</element> <element>Modoc</element> <element>Mono</element> <element>Monterey</element> <element>Napa</element> <element>Nevada</element> <element>Orange</element> <element>Placer</element> <element>Plumas</element> <element>Riverside</element> <element>Sacramento</element> <element>San Benito</element> <element>San Bernardino</element> <element>San Diego</element> <element>City and</element> <element>San Joaquin</element> <element>San Luis Obispo</element> <element>San Mateo</element> <element>Santa Barbara</element> <element>Santa Clara</element> <element>Santa Cruz</element> <element>Shasta</element> <element>Sierra</element> <element>Siskiyou</element> <element>Solano</element> <element>Sonoma</element> <element>Stanislaus</element> <element>Sutter</element> <element>Tehama</element> <element>Trinity</element> <element>Tulare</element> <element>Tuolumne</element> <element>Ventura</element> <element>Yolo</element> <element>Yuba</element> </values> </field> <field name="sig_in_lieu_filed" type="zope.schema.Date"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Sig In Lieu Filed</title> </field> <field name="nom_papers_taken" type="zope.schema.Date"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Nom Papers Taken</title> </field> <field name="nom_papers_filed" type="zope.schema.Date"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Nom Papers Filed</title> </field> <field name="doc_filed" type="zope.schema.Date"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Doc Filed</title> </field> <field name="miscellaneous" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Miscellaneous</title> </field> <field name="contact_phone" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Contact Phone</title> </field> <field name="contact_email" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Contact Email</title> </field> <field name="contact_address" type="zope.schema.Text"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Contact Address</title> </field> </schema> </model>
